Articles.Content: I installed KSP 1.12 from Steam recently and I want to add a custom mission flag. I know how to do that. But I can't find the KSP folder. Where does Steam put it?

6 hours ago, Vodostar said:

I installed KSP 1.12 from Steam recently and I want to add a custom mission flag. I know how to do that. But I can't find the KSP folder. Where does Steam put it?

Right click KSP in your Steam library, then click manage, then Browse local files. If that option isn’t there, right click KSP and click Properties, then local files, then browse local files.

Steam puts stuff inside Steam/steamapps/common so if you can find where Steam is you’re half way there already- C:/ProgramFiles(x86) is a good place to start.
Thanks. That was exactly what I needed.
